biotools.summary:
IMGT/GENE-DB is the IMGT® database for immunoglobulin (IG) and T cell receptor (TR) genes and alleles (international nomenclature).
Annotation is based on the IMGT-ONTOLOGY concepts.

bioschemas.name: IMGT GENE-DB
